name: The Violator of Voodoo
description:
The Violator Of Voodoo is the second game in a series of four text adventures based on the eternal war between the "Time Crusaders of Chronos" and the evil "Abomination" and his minions from the Primal Darkness.

The player takes the role of a man who was killed when the "Abomination" conquered his land. Rescued and recruited by the legendary "Champions of Chronos" to fight in the 'Great Temporal Struggle' you have already been reborn twice the last time being at Finvarra, Ireland. Now, like a phoenix you're reborn once more, the war continues...

In this incarnation you fight the 'Abomination' in the Caribbean and this time it's not just a village that's in peril it's the entire island. The demons are here in force so Chronos sends two warriors, yourself and Kane, to fight alongside the voodoo priest and priestess.

shot.caption: This game begins with the same background screens as the previous game, Phoenix
We're reborn and the game begins
In some parts of the game the player is referred to as Phoenix, in others they are The Traveller
